Control Name: COST 8.3 Implement services to reduce data transfer costs
Control Statement: Implement services to reduce data transfer: for example, using a CDN such as Amazon CloudFront to deliver content to end users, caching layers using Amazon ElastiCache, or using AWS Direct Connect instead of VPN for connectivity to AWS.

control_attributes.Control: COST 8.3 Implement services to reduce data transfer costs
control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you plan for data transfer charges?
